title: Lord I Would Own Thy Tender Care
lyrics:
Lord l would own
Thy tender care,
And all Thy love to me,
The food l eat, the clothes l wear;
Are all bestowed by Thee.

This Thou preservest me
From death,
And dangers every hour,
I cannot draw another breath,
Unless Thou give me power.

Kind Angels guard me
Every night,
As round my bed they stay,
Nor am I absent from Thy sight,
In darkness or by day.

My health and friends
And parents dear,
To me by God are given,
I have not any blessing here,
But what is sent from Heaven.

Such goodness lord
And constant care,
I never can repay
But may it be my daily prayer,
To love Thee and obey.
